scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npm run clean && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch
scripts.start: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf ./dist && cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../server
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m rebuild && git push
